title: 6P4C Model-Based Nursing e-Learning Design Expert Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing education theory and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented program to enhance e-learning content design capabilities for nursing managers/leaders in corporate settings

learning_goals: The six design elements of the 6P4C model (participants, platform, instructional plan, safe space, presentation strategy, feedback system) can be applied to actual nursing e-learning courses
An e-learning environment reflecting the 4C principles (courtesy, communication, collaboration, community building) can be designed and operated
Blended teaching-learning strategies integrating digital tools and offline activities suitable for large learner groups can be developed

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
